name: Subject Anti-Gravity
description:
This game was made in around 3 hours for the Trijam #79.

You're the manager of the Anti-Gravitational Testing Facility, and you must monitor the physical and mental aptitudes required for using the new Anti-Gravitational costume.

The player takes the role of each subject trying to finish the courses

Control:
WASD/Arrow keys -> movement

Enter -> Start/Restart

Z -> Toggle Anti-Gravitational costume

Instructions:
Each subject must collect batteries in order to charge the anti-gravitational costume. Each battery enables a movement of 3 tiles in anti-gravity in any of the 8 directions.

Challenge: try to finish each course with as less batteries as possible!

Technical stuff

This game was made in the Nim language using the Nico library.

All assets and code was made by me.

The source code will be released probably after the jam ends because the code rn is quite messy :P
